text: Bull Durham is an 1988 American romantic comedy baseball movie set in Durham, North Carolina. It was produced by Thom Mount and Mark Burg and was directed by Ron Shelton. Bull Durham was released on June 15, 1988 in North America. The movie received positive reviews with a 98% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 73 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == * Kevin Costner as "Crash" Davis * Susan Sarandon as Annie Savoy * Tim Robbins as Ebby Calvin "Nuke" LaLoosh * Trey Wilson as Joe Riggins * Robert Wuhl as Larry Hockett * William O'Leary as Jimmy * David Neidorf as Bobby * Samuel Veraldi as a second baseman * Stephen Ware as a umpire == Other websites == *Bull Durham's official website * * Category:1988 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sports movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in North Carolina Category:Sports comedy movies Category:Baseball movies
title: Bull Durham
